vsch.error.thruster_modes_disabled: Toggling of thy thrusters hath been dis-enabled!
vsch.message.toggle: The mode hath been set to
vsch.ponder.drag_inducer.text_1: In some occasions, you mayhaps find it difficult to reduce thy speed when in the higher-sky
vsch.ponder.drag_inducer.text_2: This here inducer of drag may aid you in your issues
vsch.ponder.drag_inducer.text_3: When provided with power from redstone, thee inducer of drag will attempt to reduce your speed in all of the compasses directions
vsch.ponder.thruster_modes.text_1: In thee normal state, thrusters be in POSITION mode
vsch.ponder.thruster_modes.text_2: This meaneth they push based on where they are
vsch.ponder.thruster_modes.text_3: Though perchance, this can causeth rotation unwanted
vsch.ponder.thruster_modes.text_4: If thou useth a rotating-stick, yon thruster can be changed to GLOBAL mode
vsch.ponder.thruster_modes.text_5: In GLOBAL mode, the thruster pushes position'd-less
vsch.ponder.thruster_modes.text_6: This circumnavigates that awful rotation unwanted
vsch.ponder.thrusters.text_1: Thou must provide power to thy thrusters with the redstone for movement
vsch.ponder.thrusters.text_2: The intensity of yon redstone controleth thee thruster strength
